lines.i: Vehicle or device used to transport patient

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.34"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11139)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10679)/@code="67549-6" Transport method NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10678)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10680), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportMethod 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.65 DYNAMIC (CONF:10681)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.16
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11139)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10679)/@code="67549-6" Transport method NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10678)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10680), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportMethod 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.65 DYNAMIC (CONF:10681)
